articles.title: Dr Hilary insists Covid-19 vaccine is safe after Linda Lusardi refuses to have jab - Mirror Online
articles.description: Former Emmerdale star Linda Lusardi has spoken on Good Morning Britain about how she has some serious doubts about the new Covid-19 vaccine
articles.content:
Good Morning Britain's Dr Hilary Jones has insisted the new coronavirus vaccine is safe after model Linda Lursadi said she'd refuse to have the jab.
